name: peer-call
description: Free and reliable audio calls for everyone.

scripts.start: signalhub listen -p 8080 & PODUSER=Mikeal DEBUG=* electron . & DEBUG=* PODUSER=Anna electron .
scripts.web: browserify -t brfs renderer.js > bundle.js && beefy renderer.js

author: Mikeal Rogers <mikeal.rogers@gmail.com> (http://www.mikealrogers.com)
